body:
Hey guys! So I'm leaving for vacation for a week today, and I'll come back on Thursday. I will have internet, but it'll be inconvenient and I think pretty slow. 
Anyways, I'm bringing my laptop, so I'm pretty sure I'll have access to TS so I can talk about my mod interview with Howsie and Jozz and Yoav and all the Sr. Mods. :D 
Um... There's really not much, except that... 
I guess I could play Minecraft while I'm there, but the spike lags would be real. 
So anyways, yea, this post is more or less, directed to Howsie and the Sr. Mod's so that they know I'm on vacation. :P

title: Vacation for a week and more!
